attributes.additional_details:
http://youtu.be/t6pmc7Tpx4w

Please see this video for just an example of what it is doing to people in the UK

This drug is very much like Heroin and is really damaging the UK's most vulnerable people. And is obtained as simply as going and buying a packet of sweets.
attributes.background:
The legal high named Spice is an extremely addictive drug causing users to have side effects such as sweating, shaking, and servere withdrawals. 
The biggest problem is our homeless community using this substance, as it's cheap and readily available near where they are living on our streets.
